content:
Welcome to my Academic site, where I share updates on my research projects.
 I will be joining University of California, San Diego in Fall 2020 as a master’s student majoring in Computer Science & Engineering.
Currently, I’m working as a year-round Research Intern at Alibaba Platform of AI (PAI).
-- I obtained my Bacholar’s degree at University of Wisconsin - Madison. I double-majored in Computer Science and Mathematics there, and maintained both major GPAs above 3.91. In May 2019, I graduated with distinction in my junior year.
University of Wisconsin - Madison and after that I will be joining and . Nelson Bighetti is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
